import React, { useState } from "react" import Head from './Head' import "./header.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Header = () => { const usenavigate = useNavigate(); const [click, setClick] = useState(false) useEffect(()=>{ let username=sessionStorage.getItem('username'); if(username==='' || username===null){ usenavigate('/login'); } },[]); return ( <>
    setClick(false)}>

) } export default Header
